item.title: Pseudo Science - Prologue
item.description: Rediscover the Wonderful World with Pseudo-Science Prologue Every year I fly back to China to visit my relatives, many years ago, when I was on the plane back to China, the air conditioning was bit too aggressive which made me uncomfortable, I tried to find something to divert my attention and then noticed the small round window next to me, it reminds me of the windows in the classroom of my elementary school, with green wooden window frame.
